title: Driving theory test pass rates in the United Kingdom 2007 - 2019 by gender
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Male, and Female. The y axis indicates the Pass rates and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Male, and Female are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Female, and lastly, 2. Male.
Throughout the period, Female generally had the highest Pass rates relative to others with an average of 58.87, and it reached its maximum at 2007/08 with a value of 68.9.
The botommost line, Male,  has a mean of 53.77, and peaked at 2008/09.
The greatest difference of Pass rates between Male and Female occurs at Year 2007/08 and the smallest difference occurs at 2015/16.
